nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_28
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The plant does not grow well in soils other than the one in which it has been developed.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_29
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Research findings show that we spend about two hours dreaming every night, no matter what we may have done during the day.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_30
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Some people tend to justify their failure by blaming others for not trying their best.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_31
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We remain true to our commitment: Whatever we promised to do, we would do it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_32
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Even Beethoven's father discounted the possibility that his son would one day become the greatest musician in the world. The same is true of Edison, who seemed to his teacher to be quite dull.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_33
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They were accused by the authorities of threatening the state security.
